actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution to encourage teachers, students, parents, and associates of our Nation's schools to participate and declare a day in the spring of 1976 as a Community Cleanup Day as a Bicentennial gift to our Nation.

summary.text: Encourages teachers, students, parents, and associates of our Nation's schools to participate and declare a day in the spring of 1976 as a Community Cleanup Day as a Bicentennial gift to our Nation. Calls upon the Govenors of these United States to designate a day in the spring of 1976 as Community Cleanup Day.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to encourage teachers, students, parents, and associates of our Nation's schools to participate and declare a day in the spring of 1976 as a Community Cleanup Day as a Bicentennial gift to our Nation.
